name: Marcus Silverstring
title: Barkeep & Entertainment Coordinator
description: A refined half-elf with an ear for music and an eye for talent. He tends the bar and manages entertainment at the Golden Griffin with professionalism and taste.

greeting.first_time: Welcome to the Golden Griffin! I'm Marcus, barkeep and entertainment coordinator. What can I get you?
greeting.returning: Ah, back again! What'll it be?

off_duty.text: I'm off duty at the moment. The tavern is open belowâ€”feel free to enjoy yourself. I'll be back on the floor soon.

buy_drink.text: I've got the finest ales and beers in the kingdom. Take a look at what we have!

ask_about_shows.text: We have live music every night at 9 PM! Different shows are available depending on the day of the week. You'll need the right instruments to perform. Bookings must be made before 8 PM. Interested in booking a show?

see_available_shows.text: Let me check what shows are available tonight...
